The course aims to provide a broad coverage of the statistical principles and techniques to interpret and extract knowledge from the data. The course is composed by two parts:

* [Data Mining](https://aldosolari.github.io/DM/)
* [Statistical Learning](https://aldosolari.github.io/SL/)
